liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

costs.label: Default Cost
costs.tooltip: Set the default cost for this command.

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user you have only $points $currency to flip the coin.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user wins.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $reward = Winning reward
 $won = Emoticon for winning
 $cost = Cost to play

responseLost.value: $user couldn't steal any $currency from $victim and lost $cost $currency
responseLost.label: User looses message
responseLost.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loose.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $lost = Emoticon for losing
 $cost = Cost to play
